scenarios.name: Andrés – Industrial Automation Engineer
scenarios.quote_en: I need to optimize a production line with systems that integrate PLCs, sensors, and remote monitoring.
scenarios.description_en: Andrés looks for integrated automation solutions to design efficient logic, visualize real-time data, and ensure interoperability among industrial devices.

scenarios.name: Laura – Industrial Software Developer
scenarios.quote_en: I'm developing a control application for a plant and need to securely connect it to the existing SCADA system.
scenarios.description_en: Laura explores the Digital Solutions section to learn about industrial APIs, Firebase integration, and secure cloud-based platforms for reliable industrial control.

scenarios.name: Ricardo – Electronics Design Specialist
scenarios.quote_en: I want to send my schematics to manufacture a PCB prototype with testing and component validation.
scenarios.description_en: Ricardo visits the Electronic Design area to upload his design files, request manufacturing, and receive expert assistance in prototype optimization.

scenarios.name: Marta – Production Plant Supervisor
scenarios.quote_en: I need to monitor plant performance and reduce downtime through automated reports.
scenarios.description_en: Marta accesses the Projects Portal or Automation area to visualize KPIs, schedule maintenance, and analyze energy efficiency reports in real time.

scenarios.name: Kevin – Mechatronics Student
scenarios.quote_en: I want to learn how to program PLCs and create my first automation projects connected to the cloud.
scenarios.description_en: Kevin visits the future IntegraDeline Academy, where he can access tutorials, simulations, and real-world project examples to develop practical automation skills.
